message:
Very close people to me knows I'm interested in Machine Learning & Prediction So I'd like to share with you something that is not new but has proven lately it's worth to watch. 

It's Apache Mahout comes with packed selected Recommendation Algorithms and play awesome with Apache Spark.

However I'm not an Expert in that yet but if there is anything I can help please let me know. Also Please recommend Other solutions are being used at your company.

If you wanna play with something that is not complicated please check http://prediction.io/

Good Luck guys!
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Mahout Item Recommender Tutorial using Java and Eclipse
caption: youtube.com
description: A basic tutorial on developing your first recommender using the Apache Mahout library. Source code is available at: https://github.com/RevBooyah/Static-mahou...

data.message:
OMG, this just solved my next week assignment :D
now my task is to re-code this in Python :D
thanks Mohamed ;)
hahahaha Welcome man, Let me know what your project is about :)
